entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You defeated Doctor Jin, found the unmutated sample and met up with Doctor Rhane.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find Griffax Jin and the unmutated sample, then get out of this place.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: [Griffax Jin] (Cough) I don't know who you are but you are...you are not authorized (Cough) to be in this facility.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Use the command console to find out where that communication came from.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Locate and speak with Doctor Jin.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Hello?  Are you still alive? We've barricaded ourselves in the maintenance room. There is an escape ladder here but the hatch is magnetically sealed. Any advice?
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Go back to the command console and see if you can unlock the escape hatch.
entries.task07_comm_message_text: That did it! You saved us...now make your way to us so we can get out of here.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Find and speak to Doctor Nomi Rhane and help with the evacuation.
